GULF OF GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-02.43N 002-59.35E
   AT 050722Z DEC. VESSELS ARE ADVISED
   TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
   AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   TELEX: MA 34199, PHONE: 603 2031 0014,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG
   AND TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 121106Z DEC 20.
